welcome: You are now a member of beabee dev newsroom, thank you for getting involved!
mailTitle: Can we send you occasional mail?
mailText: Sometimes we send our members special printed editions and other exclusive materials. You can change your mind later.
mailOptIn: Yes, you can send me occasional mail
newsletterTitle: Want to keep up to date with beabee?
newsletterText: We'll send you fortnightly updates about beabee. You can unsubscribe at any time.
newsletterOptIn: Yes, I'd like to receive the newsletter
